us.phonetic: /n. ˈdɑkjəmənt; v. -ˌmɛnt/, (n. dok′yə mənt; v. dok′yə ment′)

example.eg: The secretary put the document back in the filing cabinet.
example.egtrans: 秘书将文件放回了档案柜。

example.eg: Helen opened a new document and began to type.
example.egtrans: 海伦打开一份新的文档，开始打字。

example.eg: Please have your documents ready at border control.
example.egtrans: 请在边境检查时准备好您的文件。

example.eg: The journalist documented events in the war zone.
example.egtrans: 记者记录了战区发生的事件。

us.phonetic: /n. ˈdɑkjəmənt; v. -ˌmɛnt/, (n. dok′yə mənt; v. dok′yə ment′)

example.eg: It isn't enough to say a car hit your house; we need you to document your claim before we can authorize an insurance payout.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用文件来证明, 为…提供文件

us.phonetic: /n. ˈdɑkjəmənt; v. -ˌmɛnt/, (n. dok′yə mənt; v. dok′yə ment′)

dsense.name: attached document
dsense.guideword: ([sth] appended to letter or e-mail) (信、邮件里的)

example.eg: Please read and sign the attached document.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 附属资料, 随附文件

example.eg: This is just a draft document; I'll send you the final version next week.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 文件草案, 文件初稿

example.eg: The lawyers are drawing up a formal document detailing my divorce settlement.
example.egtrans: 律师正在起草正式文件，详述我的离婚协议。
